demos.title: SignalStore App State
demos.teaches: Create and manage application state with @ngrx/signals SignalStore. Define state shape and access it reactively with signals.

demos.title: SignalStore CRUD
demos.teaches: Implement Create, Read, Update, Delete operations in SignalStore. Manage entity mutations and side effects with effects().

demos.title: SignalStore Entities
demos.teaches: Efficiently manage collections of entities using withEntities() feature. Implement entity adapters for normalized state management.

demos.title: Deep Signals
demos.teaches: Create deeply nested signals for complex state structures. Access and update nested properties with automatic reactivity.

demos.title: Request Status Feature
demos.teaches: Build reusable store features with signalStoreFeature. Create a request status feature with state, computed properties, and pure updater functions.

demos.title: NgRx Classic Interop
demos.teaches: Integrate SignalStore with classic NgRx features. Migrate from traditional reducers and effects to signal-based store patterns.

demos.title: Container Presenter
demos.teaches: Implement the container-presenter pattern with SignalStore. Separate data management from presentation using smart and dumb components.

demos.title: Markdown Editor
demos.teaches: Compose custom store features into a real-world store. Uses withMarkdownItems() for entity CRUD and withLoadingState() for loading tracking.

comments.title: Using @ngrx/store
comments.comment: To use @ngrx/store, we need to install it first.

comments.title: Optimizing change detection
comments.comment: In order to optimize change detection, we need to use OnPush strategy.
